strings.string: Yes
No
Advantage
If all your Equipment fits in the Small Inspection area during Match preparation, you get an advantage.
Team's Robot and Equipment fit in the Small Inspection Area:
M01 Elevated Places
You can only get Flag points if you get Bridge points. It is okay and expected for Robots to collide while trying to earn Flag points.
The Robot is Supported by the Bridge:
Number of flags that are clearly raised any distance, only by the Robot:
M02 Crane
Score all that apply.
The Hooked Blue Unit is clearly lowered any distance from the Guide Hole:
The Hooked Blue Unit is Independent and Supported by another Blue Unit:
AND Level 1 is Completely in the Blue Circle:
M03 Inspection Drone
The Inspection Camera Drone Mission reveals an inexpensive way to check out bridges and other tall structures. Drones can fly for hours and send back detailed pictures and even 3D scans.
The Inspection Drone is Supported by the axle on the Bridge:
M04 Design for Wildlife
The Bat needs to end up on the brown Branch
The Bat is Supported by the Branch on the Tree:
M05 Treehouse
Score all that apply.
Number of Units Independent and Supported by the Tree's Large Branches:
Number of Units Independent and Supported by the Tree's Small Branches:
Too Many Units
M06 Traffic Jam
Clear the road by lifting the Traffic Jam.
The Traffic Jam is lifted, its moving part is Independent, and it is Supported only by its hinges:
M07 Swing
Release the Swing.
The Swing is released:
M08 Elevator
Score one or the other, but not both.
The Elevator's moving parts are are Independent and Supported only by its hinges in the following position:
Neither
Blue Car Down
Balanced
M09 Safety Factor
Can the Test Building stand when some of its support beams are moved?
The Test Building is Independent and Supported only by the blue beams:
Number of blue beams knocked out at least half way:
M10 Steel Construction
Make the Steel Structure stand up.
The Steel Structure is standing and is Independent and Supported only by its hinges:
M11 Innovative Architecture
Design and build your own Structure and deliver to any Circle.
The Structure is bigger than a Blue Building Unit and built from Team's white LEGO bricks:
The Structure is in any Circle:
No
Partly
Completely
M12 Design and Build
The Blue Circle is not part of Mission 12.
Number of Circles with a color-matching Unit, flat down on the Mat, and Completely in Circle:
Sum of heights of all Independent Stacks at least partly in any Circle:
M13 Sustainability Upgrades
Only one Upgrade (solar panels, roof garden, insulation) counts per Stack.
Number of Upgrades that are Independent and Supported only by a Stack which is at least partly in a Circle:
M14 Precision
You are allowed to Interrupt your Robot and bring it back to re-Launch, but Interruptions do lose Precision Tokens.
Number of Precision Tokens left on the Field:
Too many Building Units in use
Conflict in position of Blue Units
Height too small for number of color-matching Units
